segments.text: You are from the travel agency , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . Are you Miss Li from the travel agency ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mind telling me your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . My name is Li Ping . Is this all your baggage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . I usually travel light .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Welcome to Hong Kong . I'll go and get the car . Could you please wait a few minutes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , and I'm glad to meet you . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
